name: Form Builder Components
description:
New! Combined all variations of a single component as variants. Added form components usage example (Sign Up form).


New! Added buttons components according to the updated autolayout feature.


Form Builder Components makes it easy for you to create all sorts of forms in Figma. In the file, you will find components like input, select list, text area, checkboxes, radios and switches. All components are created with Auto Layout feature, so if needed Figma automatically will adjust the width and height of the components for you.
